summary: robots.txt and sitemap.xml were added under frontend/public, but robots.txt content appears to include an extra trailing blank line versus the required exact text. Additionally, the diff summary indicates changes beyond adding the two SEO root files, which violates the BuildRequest constraints/non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: robots.txt contents must exactly match the provided text (including newlines).
missing_requirements.reason: The added robots.txt includes a trailing blank line after the Sitemap line, which may cause the file contents to not exactly match the required text.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to UI/components/styles and other application logic beyond adding robots.txt and sitemap.xml.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints say to only add the two root SEO files and not change existing UI/design/layout/styling or other files; however the modified file summary lists many component/hook/style/config changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to project tracking/state metadata unrelated to serving robots.txt and sitemap.xml.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to add two static SEO files; project_state.json was modified.
